description:
Create column asWKT at index 5 based on column COORD_INF using expression grel:"POLYGON(("
+cells["COORD_IZQ"].value+" "+cells["COORD_SUP"].value+ ", "
+cells["COORD_IZQ"].value+" "+cells["COORD_INF"].value+ ", "
+cells["COORD_DER"].value+" "+cells["COORD_INF"].value+ ", "
+cells["COORD_DER"].value+" "+cells["COORD_SUP"].value+ ", "
+cells["COORD_IZQ"].value+" "+cells["COORD_SUP"].value+"))"
Text transform on cells in column ID_CELDA using expression grel:value.floor()
Text transform on cells in column NUM_DISTRITO using expression grel:value.floor()
